DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study Telmisartan ( Micardis ) For Prevention Acute Graft v . Host Disease Post Allogeneic Hematopoietic Stem Cell Transplantation
DOC.detailed_description: This single-center , open-label , prospective study telmisartan prevention acute GVHD approximately 60 subject undergoing allogeneic HCT treatment hematologic malignancy . Subjects receive 160 mg Micardis brand telmisartan daily , start 2 day prior HCT ( day -2 ) . Once patient discharge post-HCT , treatment continue Day +98 post-HCT total 101 day . After treatment discontinuation day +98 post-HCT , subject follow 6 month primary secondary endpoint .
